=C2=A0 


=C2=A0Yeah, been told this. I get the impression=
 there's some joining this group hoping to get their ghost huntng or spirit=
 beliefs validated, or confirmed, when they hear this junk they bail. This =
stuff is ITC, Instrumental Trans-Communication. That can be audio, video, o=
r still images. I think there is a mis-conception in the paranormal whateve=
r world that EVP is ghost voice, weak whispery barely audible noise, and IT=
C is video feedback loop images, an never shall the two ever, ever mix. Som=
e seem to think it's all perfectly well defined and laid down in laws and p=
rotocols. Afterall it's repeated on TV week after weak after week.
=C2=A0
=
=C2=A0I managed to completely offend the guy that told me about the embedde=
d images, Richard Roberts. He started laying down all these absolute undeni=
abel laws and definitions of EVP, and when I disagreed openly, he got all p=
issed off, deleted all his Facebook content, and went away, sulking in some=
 dark internet corner I guess. I feel bad about offending him, but come on!=
 Grow up out there. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Think I'll replace the tuner in this box,=
 too frikin' noisy. I don't have tuners to spare, but this one is unaccepta=
bel. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S
